withrates.applicationAccepted: Your request is being processed. Our manager will contact the exchange office to confirm the required amount and call you to confirm. After the call and confirmation, a 30-minute timer will start. You must arrive at the exchange office and complete the exchange within this time. If the exchange rate changes during this time, the exchange amount will remain unchanged. If the timer expires, we cannot guarantee the required amount will be available at the exchange office, and the exchange rate may also change.

moderation.name: In processing
moderation.title: Your request has been accepted. Please wait for a call from our specialist
moderation.bookingRateTooltip: Exchange rate at the moment of reservation
moderation.applicationAccepted: Your request is being processed. Our manager will contact the exchange office to confirm the required amount and call you to confirm. After the call and confirmation, a one-hour timer will start. You must arrive at the exchange office within this time and complete the exchange. If the exchange rate changes during this time, the exchange amount will change accordingly. If the timer expires, we cannot guarantee the required amount will be available at the exchange office.
